br.com.caelum.vraptor.http

Class VRaptorRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.ServletRequestWrapper
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequestWrapper
        • br.com.caelum.vraptor.http.VRaptorRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MutableRequest, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest, javax.servlet.ServletRequest

    public class VRaptorRequest
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequestWrapper
implements MutableRequest
    A request capable of adding new parameters.
    Author:
    guilherme silveira
